      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addShoppingCartProduct(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ShoppingCartProductDTO shoppingCartProductDTO) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      shoppingCartProductDTO - contains the data required to add a product to a users shopping cart
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added ShoppingCartProductDTO with HTTP status code 201 (Created) if successful, or HTTP status code 400 (Bad Request) otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception
